basic.des: The Basic package is designed for individuals or small businesses looking for a simple and clean logo design to establish their brand identity.

pro.des: The Pro package is perfect for businesses seeking a more comprehensive logo design with added customization and professional features.
features: High-resolution JPG, PNG, and vector (AI or EPS) files

premium.des: The Premium package offers an all-inclusive logo design experience, catering to established businesses looking for a top-tier brand identity creation.
features: High-resolution JPG, PNG, vector (AI or EPS), and PDF files
Social media kit (profile and cover images)

basic.des: The Basic Assembly Editing package is designed for individuals or businesses looking to create a rough cut of their film or video project.
features: Delivery in a standard video format

pro.des: The Pro Assembly Editing package is suitable for businesses or filmmakers seeking a more refined assembly edit with added creativity and attention to detail.
features: Chronological and thematic arrangement of clips
Audio synchronization and basic sound editing
2 rounds of revisions with client feedback
Delivery in multiple video formats for various platforms

premium.des: The Premium Assembly Editing package offers a comprehensive assembly edit with a focus on storytelling, advanced editing techniques, and high-quality visuals.
features: Advanced shot selection and sequencing for storytelling
Audio synchronization, sound mixing, and enhancement
Audio synchronization, sound mixing, and enhancement
3 rounds of revisions with client feedback
Delivery in various video formats, resolutions, and aspect ratios

basic.des: The Basic Blog Writing package is designed for individuals or businesses looking to create simple and informative blog content.

pro.des: The Pro Blog/Article Writing package is suitable for businesses seeking well-researched and engaging blog content.
features: Comprehensive Topic research and keyword integration

premium.des: The Premium Blog/Article Writing package offers in-depth, expert-level content creation for businesses aiming to establish thought leadership and drive engagement.
features: Extensive Topic research and keyword integration
